plot outline: Rupali (Rupa) is a 16 year old college student of a well to do family according to her family culture a girl should marry at the age of 16 -17.But what worries her family is that she hasn't yet achieved maturity as a female.Jagdish (Jaggu) is from a very poor background working as a mechanic.Rupa and Jaggu come across each other and after few instances of meeting fall in love.Rupa soon achieves maturity and her family decides to marry her.Jaggu and Rupa are aware that due to different family background their marriage is impossible and decide to elope and get married.
title: Ved Lavi Jeeva
plot: Rupali (Rupa) is a 16 year old college student of a well to do family according to her family culture a girl should marry at the age of 16 -17.But what worries her family is that she hasn't yet achieved maturity as a female.Jagdish (Jaggu) is from a very poor background working as a mechanic.Rupa and Jaggu come across each other and after few instances of meeting fall in love.Rupa soon achieves maturity and her family decides to marry her.Jaggu and Rupa are aware that due to different family background their marriage is impossible and decide to elope and get married.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
